InfluenceRule.name: more likely to bicker with friends
more likely to bicker with people you've interacted a lot with lately
less likely to bicker with people you think are cool

more likely to bicker with significant other

witty people more likely to bicker

more likely to bicker if want same stuff

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% dissed %ip% favorite band
%i% tried to diss %rp% hair but %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% totally zen about it
%i% wouldn't shut up about science class
%list(i,r,and)% had like a psychic fight
%i% kept bringing up that lame thing that %rs% did
%r% kept doing that thing %is% thought was gross
%list(i,r,and)% were really getting on each others' nerves
%list(i,r,and)% were bickering like an old married couple
%list(i,r,and)% bickered about texting and stuff
%i% accused %r% of harboring romantic feelings
%o% came between %list(i,r,andp)% friendship
%list(i,r,and)% got into some snide bickering action
%i% bickered with %r% but it kinda turned into a compliment
%i% bickered about %r% being too clingy
%i% bickered about %r% 'hanging out' with other people
%i% bickered about %rp% style, and found out about 'the competition'
%i% warned %r% to stay away from %o%
%i% bickered with that homewrecker %r% but gave a compliment instead
%i% tried to be bitchy but %rs% totally shut %pron(i,him/her)% down
%i% bickered with %r% about hitting on %o%
%i% couldn't stand %r% hanging out with %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% couldn't stand %r% hanging out with %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% bickered about why %rs% was friends with %o%
%r% told %i% not to make this into a big production
%i% yelled at %r% for inviting %o% over too early

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Man, I love this band.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Seriously? You *like* them?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I love these guys.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, man. Every time I hear them it's like %random(rusty nails shoved in my ears,nails on a chalkboard,the screeching of hell-spawned harpies,a thousand angry cats screaming,somebody pushed a washing machine down a flight of stairs)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How can you say that? Their music is so *%random(meaningful,deep,profound,life-changing,twinkly,beautiful)%*.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh. You've got to be kidding me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Man, your haircut looks really dumb today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha. Yeah, I guess it does.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... and your shoes are ugly.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I keep meaning to get new ones!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...you're not mad?
OMG I hate %random(biology,chemistry,physics)%. And there's like this %random(test coming up,quiz coming up,homework due,project due,paper due)% tomorrow. So crazy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's not that bad. Don't be such a whiner.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I am so not a whiner. %random(At least I'm not always going on about boring crap all the time.,Why are you always so mean to me?,What's your deal today?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't have time for this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. I still can't believe that time when %toc1%. Sooo lame.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you still hung up on that? Get over it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How could I get over something so epicly lame?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Yeah. Maybe first you should get over yourself.
...%random(I am getting so sick of you,I'm bored,I wish you would just shut up)%.
...you know, %i%, %random(you're all right,you're pretty cool,I enjoy the times we spend together)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%... you know %random(that funny noise you make when we hug,the way you scratch your ear when we're cuddling,when you laugh real loud sometimes,the way you run your fingers through my hair)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I don't like it,Quit it,It kind of annoys me,It really weirds me out)%. Please stop.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know %i%, I love you, but I don't really like you sometimes.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. I wish you would stop %random(putting those stupid stickers all over my locker,making that noise with your teeth,checking out hot freshmen in front of me,chewing bubble gum while when we're making out)% all the time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well I wish YOU would stop %random(carving our names on trees,using all my glitter paint,throwing rocks at my parents bedroom window at night,eating so loudly,embarrassing me in class)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I wish YOU wouldn't be so stupid.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well I wish YOU wouldn't be so selfish.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I love you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I love you too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%, what's wrong? %random(I texted you like five minutes ago and you never texted me back,You didn't respond to any of those texts I sent you in third period,I always see you texting your friends but you never text me.)% :-(

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you kidding? I get like no signal in here. And what's up with your profile page? %random(It still says single instead of in a relationship,You still have all those pictures of your ex up there,You haven't tagged me in any of those pics of us together,You totally never friended any of my friends who friended you even though you totally said you would)%. wtf?
OMG Whatever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Were you watching me in geography class?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? That's ridiculous. Don't flatter yourself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, please. You couldn't stop staring at me all through that lecture about %random(Spanish rivers,Danish levies,the fjords of Norway,the Swedish road network,German township boundaries)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? I'm not the one who scratched both our names into the topographic map of Africa.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Admit it. You want me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're pathetic.

Instantiation.name: Bicker - r spending more time with boyfriend Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %buddy%. So, just so you know, that was totally uncool how you blew me off to spend time with %o%. I mean, I know %gender(o,he's your boyfriend,she's your girlfriend)% or whatever, but still. We had plans, you know?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Plans? You said maybe we might hang out or something if nothing else was going on. I wouldn't call that a plan.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever. It was totally uncool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't get why you're making such a big deal out of it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's all about respect, %r%. That's all I'm saying. Respect.
%i% out.
I can't stand the way we're always at each other's throats.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Interesting, because I can't stand the way you're always complaining about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: This is exactly what I'm talking about!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get over yourself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why are you so mean?!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Me!? You're just as mean to me!
Although, I wish you'd stop complaining, it does make me want to be more mean.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Bah! You just don't understand.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I understand. You complain because you're a %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yup. You're right. Such a brilliant person you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Awww. That's so sweet of you to say! Thanks~
Hey %i%, you've been hanging out with some different people recently... huh?
Anything you wanna tell me %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ugh. Always with the twenty questions! Man, sometimes I really wish you'd back up a bit.
I have a life outside of you, yah know.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I know you do. I just sometimes wish we could be a bit closer friends too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, friends, great. Totally. Just ease it up a bit.
Hey %r%... You've really been hanging out with a lot of new faces lately...
I dunno, it just makes me a little uncomfortable that you've been spending more time around them, than me...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Listen, you gotta get over this 'little uncomfortable' thing. When you say stuff like this, it really makes me feel suffocated.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just wish you'd stop giving me reasons to worry.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What reasons to worry!? Sheesh %sweetie%, just quit worrying so much.
Although, your worries are kind justified... Like that time when %toc1%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're right %sweetie%. I'm sorry. I love you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... Totally.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ugh, I can't stand the way you carry yourself. It's getting *so* old.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Kay, what of it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just wish you'd freshen up a bit, you know - change something!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, I'm glad you're the only one who thinks that. Isn't competition nice...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Only one...? Competition? What? What do you mean %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not telling~ But you better tread lightly.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't believe you'd stoop so low.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What ever are you talking about %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know what I'm talking about! I'm talking about my %o%!
You better quit hanging around him, I'm getting real tired of hearing about you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o% has been talking about me? How sweet!
I'd say I'm getting tired of hearing about you, but %pron(o,he/she)% doesn't quite seem to mention you around me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the worst.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: At least I don't complain all the time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just stay away from %pron(o,him/her)%!!!
Hey, %r%... Can we talk?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's just that, you really have been hanging around my %gender(o, boyfriend,girlfriend)% a lot lately.
And it's really making me uncomfortable. Could you ease up a bit?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I guess that is understandable. I am pretty hot.
Since you were kind enough to compliment me, I guess I could back off just a bit.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... Thanks.
As if I'd ever compliment you...
I hate your new shoes.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: At least they're cooler than yours. Where'd you get yours, PayNone Shoes?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And your hair, ugh - like a bird's nest!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I know, isn't it great? It's kinda what is *in* right now, but you wouldn't know that - would you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh really? *In* like those clothes? More like, should be *in* a dumpster.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Kinda. I mean, I got it from a thrift store. Never been? Got it for like nothing at BetterWill. It's kinda the cool thing to do now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Cool like your... your... God I can't STAND you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, your pathetic attempts to catfight with me are cute at best.

Instantiation.name: Bicker - (SS7 Act-2) Person bickers with friend from Act 1 that hit on his girlfriend/boyfriend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. What were you doing with %o% earlier?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I was just showing %pron(o,him/her)% a good time, that's all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What the frick %pejorative%. That's my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Pfff, whatever %gender(i,dude,dudette)%. %pron(o,He/She)% isn't into you anyways.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't be a jerk, jerk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Don't be a %pejorative%, %pejorative%.

Instantiation.name: Bicker - I bickering with R about hanging out with O

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. What was going on between you and %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm just hanging out with %pron(o,him/her)%, %pron(o,he/she)% is my friend too you know.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I'm %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)%, so I get priority of %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You don't own %pron(o,him/her)%, I'm not going to let you do this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just watch me!

Instantiation.name: Bicker - I bickering with R about hanging out with O

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. What have you been doing with %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see the way you look at %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, I didn't know this was such an issue. If you need some space then I won't bother %o% anymore.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good, I hope so.
Thanks for understanding.

Instantiation.name: Friends with my Enemy Bicker Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, it's really bothering me that you're still friends with that %random(creep,freakshow,tool)% %o%. What do you see in %gender(o,him,her)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, %i%, just because you and %o% have issues doesn't mean I can't be friends with whoever I want.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's 'whomever.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whatever! The point is, my friendship with %o% has nothing to do with my friendship with you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Or does it, %r%? Or does it.
%r%, where are the new wineglasses?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What for?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That should be obvious!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh god, %i%, don't turn this into a big production, please!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Trip, what is %o% doing here already? You told me it would be an *hour* from now!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No no, Grace, %pron(o,he/she)%'s here now!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: This is SO typical, Trip.
